name: Night Hunt (ReyGameDev)
description:
Description:

There is a forest somewhere near the city, the forest is haunted, many say it was belonged by Evil kingdom in that forest. No one brave enough to go inside the forest at night (even camping).

You are a man going to the forest to test your new camera (and in search for ghost, is it true the forest is haunted?). The sky was going dark. (Will you find the truth? Or it is just a tale?).

P.S: This game is made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1. This game also have some bugs, but still playable.

How To Play:

Use the camera to defeat the ghost

Controls:

Left, Right - Move

F - Use camera

Esc - Pause
